column6: As the staggering consequences of the Cancerverse's invasion become apparent, Star-Lord and his battered band of heroes fight to protect Thanos, who has actually become the universe's only hope!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | artist:Aleksi Briclot | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Jay David Ramos | penciller:Miguel Angel Sepulveda
